stimulusHtml: The table above gives selected values for a twice-differentiable function f. Which of the following must be true?
choicesHtml: f has no critical points in the interval -1< x < 5.
f' (x) = 8 for some value of x in the interval -1<x < 5.
f ' (x) > 0 for all values of x in the interval -1<x<5
f '' (x) < 0 for for all values of x in the interval -1 < x < 5
The graph of f has no points of inflection in the interval -1< x < 5
